plot: Homer and Marge's attempt to spice up their marriage leads to the couple being chased naked through Springfield.

Marge and Homer discover that,by making love in public places, their sex life takes on an exciting new twist. They are almost caught in the nude at the novelty putting green, which leads to their having to make their escape in an air balloon which, unfortunately for them, having flown over a church with a glass roof with Homer hanging from the basket, comes to a stop in a crowded football stadium.—don @ minifie-1
